sn46.38:1.1: Yasmim, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasavako atthim katva manasi katva sabbam cetaso samannaharitva ohitasoto dhammam sunati, imassa panca nivarana tasmim samaye na honti. Satta bojjhanga tasmim samaye bhavanaparipurim gacchanti.
sn46.38:2.1: Katame panca nivarana tasmim samaye na honti?
sn46.38:2.2: Kamacchandanivaranam tasmim samaye na hoti, byapadanivaranam tasmim samaye na hoti, thinamiddhanivaranam tasmim samaye na hoti, uddhaccakukkuccanivaranam tasmim samaye na hoti, vicikicchanivaranam tasmim samaye na hoti.
sn46.38:2.3: Imassa panca nivarana tasmim samaye na honti.
sn46.38:3.1: Katame satta bojjhanga tasmim samaye bhavanaparipurim gacchanti?
sn46.38:3.2: Satisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhavanaparipurim gacchati …pe… upekkhasambojjhango tasmim samaye bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
sn46.38:3.3: Ime satta bojjhanga tasmim samaye bhavanaparipurim gacchanti.
sn46.38:3.4: Yasmim, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasavako atthim katva manasi katva sabbam cetaso samannaharitva ohitasoto dhammam sunati, imassa panca nivarana tasmim samaye na honti. Ime satta bojjhanga tasmim samaye bhavanaparipurim gacchanti”ti.
